column2: Bridgford Foods Corp. engages in the manufacture, market and distribution of frozen and snack food products throughout the United States. The company is headquartered in Anaheim, California and currently employs 544 full-time employees. The firm's segments include Frozen Food Products and Snack Food Products. Its Frozen Food Products segment includes the processing and distribution of frozen products. Its Snack Food Products segment includes the processing and distribution of meat and other convenience foods. The firm manufactures and distributes various food products, including biscuits, bread dough items, roll dough items, dry sausage products and beef jerky. The firm's store delivery network consists of non-refrigerated snack food products. The firm's frozen food products segment serves both food service and retail customers.
